mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TYPHOON_LIVE (TYPHOON_LIVE_SEQ, FT, TYP, SEQ, TYP_TM, LAT, LON, DIR, SP, PS, WS, RAD15, RAD25, LOC) VALUES ((SELECT COALESCE(MAX(T.TYPHOON_LIVE_SEQ),0)+1 FROM TYPHOON_LIVE T), #{ft}, #{typ}, #{seq}, #{typTm}, #{lat}, #{lon}, #{dir}, #{sp}, #{ps}, #{ws}, #{rad15}, #{rad25}, #{loc})
mapper.select: SELECT TYPHOON_LIVE_SEQ, FT, TYP, SEQ, TYP_TM, LAT, LON, DIR, SP, PS, WS, RAD15, RAD25, LOC FROM TYPHOON_LIVE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TYPHOON (TYP_SEQ, TYP_EN, YEAR, TM_ST, TM_ED, TYP_PS, TYP_WS, TYP_NAME, EFF) VALUES ((SELECT COALESCE(MAX(T.TYP_SEQ),0)+1 FROM TYPHOON T), #{typEn}, #{year}, #{tmSt}, #{tmEd}, #{typPs}, #{typWs}, #{typName}, #{eff})
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT T.TYP_SEQ, T.TYP_EN, T.YEAR, T.TM_ST, T.TM_ED, T.TYP_PS, T.TYP_WS, T.TYP_NAME, T.EFF -- DATE_FORMAT(N.REG_DT, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') AS REG_DT FROM TYPHOON T ORDER BY T.TYPHOON_SEQ DESC;
